title: PSVR 2 Livestream! Ask Me Anything! GT7 & Horizon Gameplay
description:
Join me live for some fun testing out the PSVR 2. I can play some games and also answer any questions you have about the headset. 

Join the discussion in my VR Discord here;
https://discord.gg/NN9TGrv

#PSVR2 #playstation #VR

title: Horizon Call Of The Mountain PSVR 2 First 15 Minutes! (4K Gameplay)
description:
In this video, I show you the first 15 minutes of the absolutely stunning Horizon Call Of The Mountain in 4K. This game is a PSVR 2 exclusive title that will be launching alongside the PSVR 2 headset on the 22nd February. 

Thanks to Playstation and Guerrilla for providing early access to the PSVR 2 headset and Horizon Call Of The Mountain. 

Let me know if you're excited for Horizon Call Of The Mountain in the comments below...

Thanks for watching []-)
